name: AMP WP – Google AMP For WordPress
author: Pixelative, Mohsin Rafique

sections.description:
Automagically add Accelerated Mobile Page Google AMP Project functionality to your site. Make your site load 5X faster on mobile by using features of the open source AMP project.

Online Demo | AMP WP – Contact Form 7 Premium Extension | Support

FREE Features

  • Gutenberg Support
  • Slider Support
  • AMP WP Powerful Settings Panel
  • AMP WP Options Panel
  • Sidebar
  • Related Posts
  • Layout – Classic View/ List View
  • Translation Panel
  • Site Loads 5x Faster in Mobiles
  • Full Google AMP Support
  • 100% Valid AMP Contents
  • 100% RTL Compatible
  • 100% Yoast SEO Compatible
  • Auto Ads For AMP Support
  • Compatible with All Cache Plugins
  • Compatible with Jetpack plugin
  • Notice Bar
  • GDPR Compliant (Europe Region)
  • Third Party Analytics to Track Visitors (Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Segment Analytics, Quantcast Tracking, Alexa Metrics, Chartbeat Analytics, comScore, Yandex Metrica, AFS Analytics, Adobe Analytics)
  • Native AMP Search Functionality
  • Show/Hide AMP Mobile Redirections for Mobile Visitors
  • Show/Hide AMP on Search Page
  • Show/Hide AMP feature on Post Types
  • Show/Hide AMP feature on Taxonomies (Categories/Tags/Custom)
  • Show/Hide Author in Archive Page
  • Show/Hide Date in Archive/Single Post Page
  • Show/Hide Author in Archive/Single Post Page
  • Show/Hide Thumbnail in Related Posts
  • Show/Hide Date in Related Posts
  • Show/Hide Author in Related Posts
  • Show/Hide Date in Home Page Slider
  • Show/Hide Author in Home Page Slider
  • Show/Hide Tags in Single Post Page
  • “Automattic AMP” Plugin Compatibility
  • Recent Comments
  • Sticky Header
  • AMP WordPress Menu
  • Custom AMP FrontPage
  • Social Icons
  • Embed Images, Videos, Audios and IFrames (YouTube, Vimeo, Vine, Twitter, Facebook, SoundCloud, Instagram).
  • Internal AMP Linking
  • Lightbox for Images
  • Enable/Disable AMP for Any Post
  • Customizable Color Scheme
  • Custom CSS Options
  • OneSignal Push Notifications integration
  • Contact Form 7 Support

Credits

  • WORDPRESS PLUGIN BOILERPLATE GENERATOR by Tom McFarlin, Inc., (https://twitter.com/tommcfarlin/)

Translators

Please contribute to translate our plugin. Contact at contact@ampwp.io.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • Install Regenerate Thumbnails and regenerate your post thumbnails to avoid breaking the layout on post list.
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater (PHP 7.0 or greater is recommended)
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater (MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended)

Automatic Installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t even need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install, log in to your WordPress admin panel, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “AMP WP” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found the plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by clicking Install Now.

Manual Installation

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Download the plugin file to your computer and unzip it.
  • Using an FTP program, or your hosting control panel, upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installation’s wp-content/plugins/ directory to your web server.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ from menu in WordPress admin panel.
  • Use the AMP WP -> Customize AMP screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
What is the URL for AMP pages?

There are 2 URL structures for an AMP site:
1) /amp/ at the start of the URLs i.e. https://yoursite.com/amp/page-name
2) /amp/ at the end of the URLs i.e. https://yoursite.com/page-name/amp

We support both structures.

Can I add analytics?

Yes, you can add third party analytics by going to AMP WP > Settings > Analytics option from the WP Admin Dashboard Menu.

Layout broken on Post Listing?

If you’re experiencing any broken layouts on post listing, it’s most probably due to difference in the thumbnail sizes. Please regenerate your thumbnails by using this plugin: Regenerate Thumbnails.

Do you have any prebuilt layouts?

Yes, we have 2 layouts for listing. You can set them from AMP WP Option Panel.

How do I add Custom HTML Tags Support?

You can add custom HTML code snippets. The snippets can be added between tags or right after tag or right before tag. All 3 options can be accessed by going to the Customizer Settings Panel (Dashboard > AMP WP > Customize AMP).

Please Note: Only valid and compatible AMP snippets would work.

Read More about AMP Components

Auto Ads For AMP Support

To add the codes for AMP Auto Ads, go to the Customizer options panel (Dashboard > AMP WP > Customize AMP) and copy/paste the code in between tags and right after tag to add support for AdSense Auto Ads for AMP.

Read More | AdSense – How To Set up Auto Ads for AMP

How do I report bugs and suggest new features?

Yes, you can report bugs/suggestions via email contact@pixelative.co

1.2.1 – 2018-11-29

1.2.0 – 2018-11-23

  • Feature: Added Post Modified date
  • Feature: Added option to hide featured image in single page
  • Note: Improvements in overall structure
  • Note: Previously, as per Google’s requirements, if the Published Date and the Modified Date had the same value, Modified Date tag wasn’t added in the structured data schema. Now, as Google has revised the requirements, Modified Date tag will be added regardless of whether it’s the same as Published Date.
